text: Lincoln MacCauley Alexander (January 21, 1922 â€“ October 19, 2012) was a Canadian politician and statesman. Alexander served as a Member of Parliament in the House of Commons, the federal Minister of Labour, and later as the 24th Lieutenant Governor of Ontario, from 1985 to 1991. Alexander was also a governor of the Canadian Unity Council. ==References== ==Other websites== * Autobiography Category:1922 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Politicians from Toronto Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Ontario
title: Lincoln Alexander
